name: Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc.
bossPosition: Executive Vice President Worldwide Government Affairs
goal:
Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc. (SPE) is a subsidiary of Sony Entertainment Inc., which itself is a subsidiary of Tokyo-based Sony Corporation. SPE's global operations encompass motion picture production, acquisition and distribution; television production, acquisition and distribution; television networks; digital content creation and distribution; operation of studio facilities; and development of new entertainment products, services and technologies.
For more information about Sony Pictures, please visit www.sonypictures.com.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Intellectual Property, Audiovisual, culture, media policy, the internal market, consumer policy, competition, trade, Brexit and the Information Society
